Program.Name: COMPDESMAT
Program.ShortDescription: Generates a .m file with the relevant information of the model
Program.Description: Generates a .m file with the relevant information that has been applied into the model. It is valid for 2D and 3D, and it can bee applied -Forces -Pressures -Displacements -Volumetric Forces -Groups -Materials
Program.NewsInVersion: * Added the 3D volumes * Added the Surface Pressure * Added the Micro condition: Master-Slave condition (For 2D and 3D)
